Term.Name: Derivation
Ableitungsrecht
Term.Definition: Indicates that the licensee gets the rights to produce editorial works, not only audiovisual, freely inspired by the content of the material being exchanged. Examples could be the derivation of books from drama or fiction programmes, or the production of a sequel of a movie
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Merchandising
Merchandising
Term.Definition: Indicates that the licensee gets the right to produce or to commit to produce things like artworks, gadgets, drawings, illustrations, banners, clothes etc. for commercial purposes and with a clear or explicit reference to the editorial content of the material being exchanged
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Partial Ownership
Term.Definition: Indicates that the licensee receives partial ownership rights for the material being exchanged. The ownership quota is not specified
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Publication
Term.Definition: Indicates that the licensee gets the rights to publish the material without changing the original editorial form of the material
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Total Ownership
Term.Definition: Indicates that the licensee receives full ownership rights for the material being exchanged
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Use
Nutzung
Term.Definition: Indicates that the licensee gets the rights to use portions of the material in order to produce other programmes or programme items. Examples of this may be the insertion of clips, images or pieces of music into other productions
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: Versionning
Versionierung
Term.Definition: Indicates that the licensee gets the rights to produce, and then publish, editorial versions of the material slightly different from that being exchanged. Examples could be the production of a version with sound dubbed in another language or with close-caption subtitles or with the cut of some scenes
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML

Term.Name: PersonalityRight
Persönlichkeitsrecht
Term.Definition: The right of protection the person's reputation, honour and privacy.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: CopyRight
Urheberrecht
Term.Definition: The right that grants the creator of an original work exclusive rights for its use and distribution.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: AttributionRight
Nennungsrecht
Term.Definition: The right to claim authorship of the work.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: IntegrityRight
Integritätsrecht
Term.Definition: The right to object to any distortion, mutilation or other modification of, or other derogatory action in relation to, the work which would be prejudicial to the author's honour or reputation.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: DisclosureRight
Veröffentlichungsrecht
Term.Definition: The exclusive right to disclose the work.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: WithdrawalRight
Widerrufsrecht
Term.Definition: The exclusive right to withdraw the work.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: Ownership
Eigentumsrecht
Term.Definition: Indicates the ownership rights for the material.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: LicenseRight
Lizenzrecht
Term.Definition: The transfer of a license right means the licensee grants the licensor permission to use a work.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: ChargeRepetitionRight
Wiederholungshonorar
Term.Definition: Claim for payment for the rebroadcast of a movie production.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project

Term.Name: OtherRight
sonstiges Recht
Term.Definition: Other right, not directly assigned to a specific right type.
Term.ChangeComment: First version within the Dwerft project
